```{r}
library(ggplot2)
abstract_text <- paste0(
  "Ordinal Subtype and Stage Inference ", 
  "estimates the order of symptoms in ",
  "Fragile X-associated tremor/ataxia syndrome patients.",
  "Female premutation carriers developed mood disorder symptoms ",
  "at earlier FXTAS stages than males."
) 
iris |> 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, col = Species) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(caption = abstract_text) +
  theme(
    plot.caption = ggtext::element_textbox_simple(
      # margin = 5,
      padding = grid::unit(8, "pt")
    ),
    plot.caption.position = "plot")
  
```
